description: This file declares the CmadLogger class, which extends SysResLogger, and provides logging functionalities with methods for building and logging buffer data. It includes necessary headers and defines class members.

classes.name: CmadLogger
classes.description: A logger class inheriting from SysResLogger that manages logging for system resources, with configurable threshold and buffer length.

methods.name: CmadLogger
methods.description: Constructor initializing the logger with threshold, buffer length, and optional filename.

methods.name: ~CmadLogger()
methods.description: Destructor (default, does not perform custom cleanup).

methods.name: Build
methods.description: Protected method to build buffer data from a list of IpCmaNode objects.

methods.name: Log
methods.description: Protected method to perform logging with the buffer offset and list of IpCmaNode objects.
